title: Patriotic Sri Lankans gather at Global Sri Lankan Forum Inaugural meeting in Toronto
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma The Patriotic Sri Lankans gathered at Radisson Hotel at Toronto on 25th of May for the inaugural meeting of Global Sri Lankan Forum. The meeting hall was decorated with Sri Lankan and Canadian flags all over the room, which expressed the true nationalist and patriotic sprit of the Forum….
